notes: Phase 6 Step 51 REQUIREMENTS COMPLETE. Researched official SORA docs (OSO #17/18/19, Annex A/B/C). Created comprehensive requirements doc (STEP_51_GIS_REQUIREMENTS.md, 600+ lines) with 6 core GIS components, dual SORA compliance (2.0 + 2.5), and 14-day implementation roadmap. Phase 5 complete: 7 services, 8 docs, 256/257 tests passing. Ready to implement GIS models/services/controllers.

arcCalculatorFixes.description: ARC Calculator CSV Fixes - All critical calculator logic implemented and verified against EASA/JARUS Annex C

remainingTasks.detail: ARCRequest_2_5 expects altitude_agl_m but tests use max_height_agl_m - add Pydantic Field alias
Change expected_initial_arc from ARC-a to ARC-b for atypical/segregated case
Mode-S precedence over near-aerodrome, uncontrolled ≥120m authority flag, SUBURBAN→URBAN normalization, unknown SM tokens ignored

arcCalculatorFixes.notes: All 23 code fixes applied successfully. Strategic mitigations, AEC 1-12 mapping, FL600+ handling, 150m pivot, airport/heliport logic, SUBURBAN normalization, SM validation, 120m authority flag - all verified against official EASA Easy Access Rules (Jul 2024) and JARUS SORA 2.0/2.5 Annex C. Remaining work is test-only.
